moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 b6: Not a very good move, since it doesn't support the d5 pawn.
moves.3. cxd5 Qxd5: The queen will of course come under attack.
moves.4. Nc3 Qf5: This is a bad square for the queen.  Better might have been Qh5, but more likely Qa5 or Qd8.
moves.5. e4 Qg6 6. Nf3 Bg4: I am showing this rather bad game because I like White's next move.
moves.7. Qc2: This is a very useful move because it protects the e4 pawn with threats of 8. Ne5, 8. Nb5 and 8. Nd5.
moves.7... Bc8: This retreat makes no sense, and leaves black open to a crushing attack.   Interesting would have been ... 7... Bxf3 8. gxf3 c6 9. Nd5 Kd8 10. Bf4 Nd7 11. Rc1 e5 12. Rg1 Qxg1 13. Qxc6 Bb4+ 14. Bd2 Bxd2+ 15. Ke2 Nc5 16. Qd6+ Nd7 17. Qc7+ Ke8 18. Qc8+ Rxc8 19. Rxc8#
moves.8. Ne5 Qf6: A poor choice for the queen, but it doesn't matter since black's position is on the verge of collapse.
